backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, vehicles, notifications, invite tokens, and admin/user permission helpers with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing PWA-related features, affected files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence entries.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files, their behaviors, and recent feature integrations.
frontend/.eslintrc.cjs: ESLint configuration for TypeScript and React with custom rules and ignored patterns.
frontend/.prettierrc.json: Prettier formatting rules defining project-wide style settings.
frontend/CHANGE_CONTROL_POLICY.md: Change‑control rules defining protected interfaces, backend API stability requirements, and mandatory review checklists.
frontend/CHANGELOG.md: Project changelog documenting PWA additions, vehicle ownership revocation, and initial release history.
frontend/ci-run-gates.sh: Shell script running all frontend quality gates via npm.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file configuring PWA metadata, icons, manifest, and mounting the React app.
frontend/PR_CHECKLIST.md: Pull‑request checklist enforcing change‑control policy, testing, documentation, and quality gate verification.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, colors, icons, categories, and launch settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache management with network-first and cache-first strategies and exclusions for PWA assets.
frontend/QUALITY_GATES.md: Documentation describing automated frontend quality gates and how to run them.
frontend/README_CHANGE_CONTROL.md: Guide explaining how developers should follow the project's change‑control system.
frontend/README_VERSIONING.md: Semantic versioning guide describing release version rules for the project.
frontend/src/__tests__/router-smoke.test: Empty test file placeholder for router smoke tests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Query, TanStack Router routes, and initializes the app structure and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/activation/Vehic: UI card for viewing activation status and redeeming vehicle registration activation tokens with form handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with navigation back to the dashboard and admin info alert.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Error screen showing profile load failures with canister diagnostics, backend health checks, and copyable error details.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Renders the Internet Identity sign‑in interface with branding, feature highlights, and a login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupBoot: Displays detailed startup error diagnostics with retry handling, backend health checks, and clipboard copy support.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Shows the application logo at configurable sizes using a static image asset.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Empty placeholder file for a future language selection component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with conditional header, footer, navigation routing, and PWA install banner.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog for reporting a vehicle as lost, stolen, or pawned with category selection and note input.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog for submitting a found‑vehicle report with a required description.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Renders the top navigation bar with routes, user menu, admin access, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallAppBa: Displays an install‑prompt banner for PWA installation when the app is installable.
frontend/src/components/system/TopLevelE: Catches uncaught render errors and shows a fallback screen instead of crashing the app.
Displays a full‑screen fallback UI for fatal app errors with guidance and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Handles starting a vehicle transfer by verifying a PIN and generating a transfer code with copy‑link support.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: Modal dialog prompting for a PIN with validation, error display, and async submit handling.
frontend/src/components/vehicle/VehicleP: Shows a vehicle photo with graceful fallback if loading fails.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrapStat: Tracks actor bootstrap errors with bounded and continuous retry logic and exposes retry state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin‑related queries and mutations including admin checks, invite codes, and activation token generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Checks backend diagnostics using an anonymous actor to report reachability and build info.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Hooks for fetching lost vehicles and marking vehicles lost or found with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Provides hooks to fetch user notifications and mark them as read with periodic polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Mutation hook for completing onboarding with detailed logging and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Hooks for checking, setting, and updating a user's PIN using actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile with identity-aware caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Hooks to initiate and accept vehicle transfers and refresh related vehicle data.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleCheck.ts: Mutation hook to check a vehicle's status by engine number.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleRegistratio: Hooks for checking activation status and redeeming activation tokens for vehicle registration.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Hooks for fetching user vehicles, fetching a single vehicle, registering vehicles, and revoking ownership.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Empty file placeholder for i18n configuration.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Empty file placeholder for i18n provider setup.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/ar.ts: Empty file for Arabic translation data.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/en.ts: Empty file for English translation data.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/id.ts: Empty file for Indonesian translation data.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/zh-Hans.ts: Empty file for Simplified Chinese translation data.
frontend/src/i18n/storage.ts: Empty file likely intended for language storage utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry mounting React, query client provider, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/__tests__/VehiclesPag: Empty test file placeholder for VehiclesPage fetch-flow tests.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: UI page describing the app, features, and admin contact details.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Form page allowing users to enter a transfer code and accept a vehicle transfer, with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing system stats, admin access verification, and error handling for admin and stats fetches.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin page for generating activation tokens for user vehicle registration, including validation and clipboard actions.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing counts of vehicles, notifications, and reported vehicles, plus quick navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Displays a searchable list of lost, stolen, or pawned vehicles with status badges and report details.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Lists user notifications with timestamps and allows marking individual alerts as read.
Empty placeholder page for onboarding via invite.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: User onboarding form collecting profile info and handling first-admin setup logic.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile management page enabling editing user info, managing PIN setup/update, and showing activation status.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Form page for registering a new vehicle, handling photo upload, activation checks, and submission via registerVehicle hook.
frontend/src/pages/ReportFoundVehiclePag: Page for checking a vehicle by engine number and submitting a found-vehicle report when eligible.
frontend/src/pages/RevokeOwnershipPage.t: Interface allowing users to revoke ownership of their active vehicles with PIN confirmation.
Security settings page for creating or updating the user's transfer PIN with validation and status alerts.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleCheckPage.tsx: Page to check vehicle status by engine number and display alerts, badges, photos, and report options.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific vehicle, including status, ownership actions, and revoke workflow with PIN verification.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Shows the user's vehicle list with status badges and provides actions for registration based on activation state.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker in production and handles update detection for PWA support.
frontend/src/pwa/usePwaInstallPrompt.ts: React hook managing the PWA install prompt, user dismissal logic, and triggering installation.
frontend/src/routes/RootRouteGate.tsx: Gates the root route by handling auth state, profile loading, and actor bootstrap errors with redirects and loading screens.
frontend/src/test/setup.ts: Test setup file with no content.
frontend/src/utils/__tests__/bootstrapEr: Empty test placeholder for bootstrap error utilities.
frontend/src/utils/actorProxy.ts: Wraps backend actors to safely handle admin access control initialization and prevent startup traps.
frontend/src/utils/actorQueryKey.ts: Provides a canonical React Query key for actor-related queries.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Defines and checks a client-side allowlist of admin principals.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapError.ts: Classifies bootstrap errors, detects stopped-canister cases, and formats guidance and technical details.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeActorError.t: Normalizes actor call errors into user-safe messages with categorized error types.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingTroubleshoo: Empty utility placeholder for onboarding troubleshooting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/src/version.ts: Defines the application's version and build timestamp.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration with theme extensions, plugins, and color system definitions.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state and requirements for fixing the PWA mobile install experience, including issues with install prompts and icons. Lists existing PWA-related features, a new fix request, and project metadata.
